swaminadan amathyawarayage mema nirdeshaya sambandhayen pasugiya juni masa 17 wanida sannde tayims deshapalana thiruwen sawisthara anawaranayak sidukarina.ugath padam ha sanhidiya komisame warthawa matha pihita mema nirdeshaya idiripath karana bawa amathyawaraya sadahan kala da, pasuwa komisame warthawa adhyanaya kirimen eya sampurnayenma nomaga yawana sulu prakashayak bawa anawaranaya wiya.dimana dimak gana salaka balenne nam, eya thaniwa salakiya nohaki bawath, nawatha padinchi kirima saha sanwardhana mulopaya yana siyalla samasthayak lesa salaka hadunwadiya yuthu bawath, komisame nirdeshayayi.
